医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
从森林到餐桌：研究揭示野外的营养强国研究人员发现，纽约州锡拉丘兹的可采食植物具有与商业食品相当或更好的营养价值，特别是富含抗氧化剂的野生水果、蔬菜和草药。这些发现表明，野生植物对于解决粮食不安全的城市地区的营养缺乏问题至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/From-the-forest-to-the-table-Study-reveals-nutritional-powerhouses-in-the-wild.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/From-the-forest-to-the-table-Study-reveals-nutritional-powerhouses-in-the-wild.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d51461c1-7644-4ac7-a121-274f0c4ef889 Thu, 02 Nov 2023 22:08:00 -0400 From the forest to the table: Study reveals nutritional powerhouses in the wild
基因发现揭示卵巢发育弗朗西斯·克里克研究所和蔚蓝海岸大学的研究人员与法国和瑞士的其他实验室一起，发现了一种基因，它是小鼠卵巢发育的早期决定因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Gene-discovery-sheds-light-on-ovary-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Gene-discovery-sheds-light-on-ovary-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=726047ac-0e91-4e54-9ef4-29b9e619fba3 Thu, 02 Nov 2023 22:01:53 -0400 Gene discovery sheds light on ovary development
大脑的完美音调：新研究调整普通话音调控制研究人员发现，大脑双侧喉部运动皮层中的局部神经群是控制普通话声调音高动态的关键，颠覆了单音类别编码的想法。对这些区域的直接刺激会改变音调，增进我们对言语产生和言语障碍的潜在治疗的理解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Brains-pitch-perfect-New-study-tunes-into-Mandarin-tone-control.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Brains-pitch-perfect-New-study-tunes-into-Mandarin-tone-control.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7ddc1225-9e79-4e2d-aa1a-a20654d96c3f Thu, 02 Nov 2023 21:35:00 -0400 Brain's pitch perfect: New study tunes into Mandarin tone control
研究人员发现癌症治疗耐药的新机制威尔康奈尔医学院和纽约长老会研究人员发现了一种令人惊讶的机制，可以使某些癌症产生耐药性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Researchers-discover-new-mechanism-of-cancer-treatment-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Researchers-discover-new-mechanism-of-cancer-treatment-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ee2cb648-251d-4749-be69-644b4b54de0d Thu, 02 Nov 2023 21:03:45 -0400 Researchers discover new mechanism of cancer treatment resistance
柑橘类化合物在 2 型糖尿病管理中显示出巨大的前景柑橘类化合物在 2 型糖尿病管理、降低血糖和减轻代谢并发症方面显示出前景，但生物类黄酮功效在人体中没有明确的阈值。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Citrus-compounds-show-zesty-promise-in-type-2-diabetes-management.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Citrus-compounds-show-zesty-promise-in-type-2-diabetes-management.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=271e57ff-09ac-44a4-b152-ff6fe1530752 Thu, 02 Nov 2023 21:03:00 -0400 Citrus compounds show zesty promise in type 2 diabetes management
科学家解码控制特定性别器官发育的遗传程序性别特异性特征的发展在哺乳动物中很常见。这些特征源于相应基因程序的激活，而迄今为止，科学界基本上尚未描述过这些基因程序。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Scientists-decode-genic-programs-controlling-sex-specific-organ-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Scientists-decode-genic-programs-controlling-sex-specific-organ-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b75ade91-3af8-42bd-876f-fcdb8de37777 Thu, 02 Nov 2023 20:56:24 -0400 Scientists decode genetic programs controlling sex-specific organ development
新报告强调了护理的财务影响根据 TIAA 研究所和宾夕法尼亚大学护理学院 (Penn Nursing) 的一份新报告，许多人忽视了财务护理的短期和长期成本，这是财务顾问和雇主可以帮助解决的一个日益严重的问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/New-report-highlights-the-financial-impact-of-caregiving.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/New-report-highlights-the-financial-impact-of-caregiving.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c9b32767-bf26-4448-b514-4310af3a7e75 Thu, 02 Nov 2023 20:32:01 -0400 New report highlights the financial impact of caregiving
塔夫茨大学的研究人员探索衰老科学抗皱霜、让你保持年轻的超级食品、承诺改善记忆力的膳食补充剂、可以永远自我更新的“不朽”细胞——在我们的商店和媒体上，关于衰老的说法比比皆是。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Tufts-researchers-explore-the-science-of-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Tufts-researchers-explore-the-science-of-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4d90cbea-2d95-4951-ba39-d32c6c71a2c7 Thu, 02 Nov 2023 20:26:45 -0400 Tufts researchers explore the science of aging
研究发现，七分之一的美国人长期感染新冠病毒伦敦大学学院和达特茅斯学院的学者对长期感染新冠病毒和症状流行情况进行了大规模调查，称到 2022 年底，美国有七分之一的人患有长期感染新冠病毒。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/One-in-seven-Americans-have-had-long-Covid-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/One-in-seven-Americans-have-had-long-Covid-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fac71529-9568-4bad-9c28-6bbcb113dce8 Thu, 02 Nov 2023 20:21:27 -0400 One in seven Americans have had long Covid, study finds
COVID-19 大流行可能会阻碍减少牙科护理中阿片类药物使用的努力一项新的研究显示，如今在美国接受拔牙或其他痛苦牙科手术的美国人获得阿片类止痛药的可能性比几年前要小得多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/COVID-19-pandemic-may-have- thrown-a-wrench-in-efforts-to-reduce-opioid-use-in-dental-care。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/COVID-19-pandemic-may-have- thrown-a-wrench-in-efforts-to-reduce-opioid-use-in-dental-care。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2c28dd1f-4eb4-4daf-bf70-6bac489aad04 Thu, 02 Nov 2023 20:17:29 -0400 COVID-19 pandemic may have thrown a wrench in efforts to reduce opioid use in dental care
